description:
The group that drafted a key blueprint for Donald Trump’s second term convened a meeting in Washington D.C. this week to consider proposals for bulldozing the European Union (EU). The Polish investigative outlet VSquare revealed that the Heritage Foundation gathered hardline conservative groups on 11 March to hear how they would overhaul the current structures […]

The post Heritage Foundation and Allies Discuss Dismantling the EU appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Heritage Foundation and Allies Discuss Dismantling the EU

description:
Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) chief Lee Zeldin announced this week that the Trump administration will “reconsider” federal rules that pushed power companies to start planning to reduce their climate-altering pollution over the next couple of decades. “[W]hen coal plants are open, viable and thriving,” the EPA wrote in a fact sheet accompanying the announcement, “we […]

The post Trump Plan to Use EPA to Promote AI Could Harm the Climate and Drive Up Electric Bills appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Trump Plan to Use EPA to Promote AI Could Harm the Climate and Drive Up Electric Bills
